Death List

How To Play

If you are on phone, it is recommended that you use landscape mode.

Enter names of participants/choices into the text box on the right with one name/item per line.

When all items are entered, press start to begin simulation.

The order of deaths will appear on the left with the first death as 1, second death as 2, and so on.

If you are using this to select your teams: Use the death list in any way to split the teams, be it odds and evens, first X names, or however you like.

If you are using this to choose one item from many: Take the winner at the end.

Your data will from this run will be saved into a database where it can be viewed later.

Credit to LF2.net for the sprites.

Game Mechanics

Red Text: Indicates name of character.

Green Bar: Indicates current HP. Set at 100 for all characters.

Blue Bar: Indicates cooldown timer where character is unable to attack.

Blue Text: Indicates when a character is knockedback and is unable to attack or be attacked.

All characters start with 100 health and do 10 damage per hit.

Given that both characters have an attack available, there is 50/50 chance on who manages to hit the other. If a character encounters another character with time remaining on his attack cooldown, the character who has the attack available will always be able to hit the other.
